name: FLO
description:
Introduction

FLO is a 2D top-down shooter created in Unity 2D. The goal is to survive the 3 levels while managing your onboard store of energy. Collecting too much energy or taking a hit without any energy remaining will cause you to take damage.

How to Play:

Background

This game is the first entry in my portfolio. It isn't exactly a brain-wrinkler in terms of gameplay or design but I promised myself I would create and 'release' a game by the end of 2020. I'm quite pleased with the outcome even if it is a bit rough around the edges, at some point you have to call it a day. I solidified a lot of my understanding of Unity and specifically Unity 2D over the course of development which I'm happy about.

The source for the unity project can be found here: https://github.com/KobaltBox/FLO
